name: Appsmith
description: Appsmith is an open-source platform to build and deploy internal tools or admin panels.

APPSMITH_ENCRYPTION_PASSWORD.description: Encryption password to encrypt all credentials in the database

APPSMITH_ENCRYPTION_SALT.description: Encryption salt used to encrypt all credentials in the database

APPSMITH_MAIL_ENABLED.description: Set this value to true to enable email sending

APPSMITH_MAIL_FROM.description: Email ID using which emails will be sent from your installation

APPSMITH_REPLY_TO.description: Email ID to which all email replies will be sent to

APPSMITH_MAIL_HOST.description: The host endpoint for the SMTP server

APPSMITH_MAIL_SMTP_TLS_ENABLED.description: Set this value to enable TLS for your SMTP server

APPSMITH_MAIL_SMTP_AUTH.description: Set this value to true if your SMTP server requires authentication

APPSMITH_OAUTH2_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID provided by Google for OAuth2 login

APPSMITH_OAUTH2_GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret provided by Google for OAuth2 login

APPSMITH_OAUTH2_GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID provided by Github for OAuth2 login

APPSMITH_OAUTH2_GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret provided by Github for OAuth2 login

APPSMITH_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY.description: Google Maps API key which is required if you wish to leverage Google Maps widget. Read more at: https://docs.appsmith.com/third-party-services/google-maps

APPSMITH_DISABLE_TELEMETRY.description: We want to be transparent and request that you share anonymous usage data with us. This data is purely statistical in nature and helps us understand your needs & provide better support to your self-hosted instance. You can read more about what information is collected in our documentation https://docs.appsmith.com/telemetry/telemetry
